title: Session Edits Tracking
description: Tracks files edited during a Claude Code session for use by hooks

files.description: Array of file paths that have been edited in this session

items.description: Absolute path to an edited file

notes: This file is created and managed by the edit-tracker hook
It should be added to .gitignore as it's session-specific
Hooks can read this file to determine which files were edited
The file is reset at the start of each new session
